name: Magic Bakery PANIC
description:
Weekly Game Jam 95 Submission - Bad Cooking

Controls:

Arrow keys or A & D to move character left and right.

Left Mouse to launch bubble spell.

Right Mouse to fire destruction spell.

How to Play:

A young witch has opened a bakery with the help of her Shibe familiars. Unfortunately, they are not the best at baking... maybe a 50/50 quality output ratio. They will launch baked items, both delicious and disgusting, and it's up to you to sort them out! More items will launch as you increase sales.

Your bubble spell will trap a baked good inside, floating it to the customers. Be careful not to bubble bad items!

Your destruction spell will destroy any non-bubbled baked good it hits.

You can also ignore baked goods, and they will eventually splat. You will be penalized for wasting good items!

If at any time your profit is at -$300 or below, the store will close. (Game Over)

Final score is based on the number of successful sales.
